dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Hi, I'm excited to chat with you, what's on your mind, want to talk about the colour blue?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I love blue! It's one of my favorite colors

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Me too, blue is amazing, it's actually one of the primary colours in painting and colour theory.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: you really can't go wrong with wearing blue colors

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: In the Middle Ages, Europeans actually wore clothing coloured with a vegetable dye called woad, which was a type of blue.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I've never heard the word "woad" before. Interesting

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yeah, it's an old one, later replaced by finer indigo from America, but still cool to know where our blues come from!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I learned something new today!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome, learning something new is always a great feeling, blue is full of interesting facts!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I never know if its okay to wear a blue shirt with blue jeans. I have no fashion sense

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Don't worry, blues can be mixed, like azure has some green, so go for it, blue on blue can look great!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: good to know. Thanks

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're welcome, happy to help, and who knows, maybe you'll start a blue revolution in fashion!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I doubt it :)

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: But hey, at least the sky and sea will always be in style, right, they're blue and always look great!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: that's funny. Yes that will always in style

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Nature's own fashion statement, and it's always on point, blue is just a great colour!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: such an interesting point. Maybe that is why blue is so popular

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I think that's part of it, blue is just so calming and natural, it's no wonder it's a favourite for so many people!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: it really is nature's color. I could stare at the ocean for hours.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: The ocean's blue is mesmerizing, and it's amazing how it's created by the way light scatters, Rayleigh scattering, pretty cool huh?
